keyFacts: Email chain reveals coordination between Epstein's defense attorney and prosecutors regarding plea and sentencing dates.
Confusion existed between December 16, 2007 and January 4, 2008 as the date for Epstein's plea and sentencing.
Epstein's attorney Jay Lefkowitz confirms January 4, 2008 as the date when both plea and sentencing would occur together.
The correspondence shows attorney-client privileged communication from Kirkland & Ellis LLP regarding the Epstein case.
